Token.Abstract: The AlfrescoSearchService provides various ways to search an Alfresco repository.
Initialises with a standard Cloud or OnPremise session

Parameter.Name: session
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoSession to initialise the site service with.

Token.Abstract: Performs a search based on the search statement and given query language. Query language can be either CMIS SQL. For this a valid CMIS SQL statement needs to be passed to the method. The alternative is to use a space delimeted keyword string

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: the query language to be used.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved nodes in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Performs a space delimited keyword search with or without exact matches, optionally including the results of a full text search.

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: the query language to be used.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: the ListingContext options used for paging

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved nodes in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Performs a space delimited keyword search with or without exact matches, optionally including the results of a full text search. The method uses

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoKeywordSearchOptions objects with the search settings.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved nodes in case the operation succeeds.

Token.Abstract: Performs a space delimited keyword search with or without exact matches, optionally including the results of a full text search.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: the AlfrescoKeywordSearchOptions objects with the search settings.

Parameter.Name: listingContext
Parameter.Abstract: the ListingContext options used for paging

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: The block that's called with the retrieved nodes in case the operation succeeds.
